title: 安装了热力膨胀MOD，查看相关元素就会崩溃。求解决，谢谢。
author: ssaz268
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Rendering screen

A full error report has been saved to C:\Users\游戏\Desktop\Minecraft\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-05-20_03.41.26-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(



--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 882b78b5 --------
Full report at:
C:\Users\游戏\Desktop\Minecraft\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-05-20_03.41.26-client.txt
Please show that file to Mojang, NOT just this screen!
